article_title: FedEx Misclassified Drivers As Independent Contractors, Rules Ninth Circuit

article_metadata.author: Robert W. Wood

og.description: Ninth Circuit Slams FedEx Ground, Ruling that Drivers Are Employees, Not "Independent Contractors." The Case is Seismic For IRS, Worker Status and More. Here's Why.
